text: The 1986–87 Thorn EMI Rugby Union County Championship was the 87th edition of England's County Championship rugby union club competition. Yorkshire won their 11th title after defeating Middlesex in the final. == Semi finals == {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !width=80| Date !width=150| Venue !width=100| Team One !width=150| Team Two !width=100| Score |- | March 14 || Moseley || North Midlands || Yorkshire ||0-24 |- | March 14 || The Stoop ||Middlesex || Cornwall || 20-18 |- |} == Final == {| width="80%" |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" |- !width="20"| !!width="200"| |- | 15||R Adamson || Wakefield |- | 14||Mike Harrison (capt) || Wakefield |- | 13|| John Bentley || Otley |- | 12|| John Buckton || Saracens |- |11 ||Rory Underwood || Leicester |- | 10|| Rob Andrew || Wasps |- | 9|| David Holmes || Sheffield |- | 1|| Martin Whitcombe || Bedford |- | |2||P Sellar || Hull and East Riding |- | 3||A Rice || Hull and East Riding |- | 4||G Thompson || Roundhay |- |5 || D Baldwin || Wakefield |- |6 ||S Tipping || Sale |- | 7|| Peter Winterbottom ||Headingley |- |8 ||Peter Buckton || Orrell |} |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font- size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" align="center" |- !width="20"| !!width="200"| |- |15 || Huw Davies || Wasps |- |14 || Simon Smith || Wasps |- | 13|| Rob Lozowski|| Wasps |- | 12|| C R J Smith || Harlequins |- | 11|| A A Dent || Harlequins |- | 10 || D M Fletcher || Harlequins |- | 9|| J C Cullen || Richmond |- | 1|| Paul Curtis ||Harlequins |- | 2|| John Olver || Harlequins |- |3 || J Thorne || Richmond |- |4 || Chris Pinnegar || Wasps |- |5 || J R Howe || Saracens |-|- |6 ||Mark Rigby || Wasps |- | 7|| Ken Moss || Wasps |- |8 || Paul Jackson (capt) || Harlequins |- |colspan=3|Replacements: |- | || Floyd Steadman || Saracens (for Cullen) |- |colspan=3|Coach: |- | || Dick Best |} |} ==See also== * English rugby union system * Rugby union in England ==References== Rugby Union County Championship Category:County Championship (rugby union) seasons
